title: Hybrid Smart Lake Cleaner
summary: Designed an IoT-powered cleaning system to monitor and improve lake health using hybrid mechanical and sensor-based mechanisms.

title: MediConnect
summary: Healthcare platform concept improving coordination between patients, doctors, and services with an emphasis on clarity and trust.

title: Manpower Connect
summary: Worker hiring platform idea aligning the right opportunities with the right people using structured data and transparent flows.

title: Pinterest-style Gallery
summary: Aesthetic, masonry-style gallery built with Flask, highlighting visual storytelling and simple content management.

title: WearYourBond
summary: Concept brand exploring how personalization, narrative, and design can come together in a wearable experience.

title: Smart Reminder Assistant
summary: Assistant that uses sensors and scheduled triggers to create context-aware reminders in everyday spaces.

title: Data Analytics Mini Projects
summary: A series of mini projects including fraud detection experiments, exploratory dashboards, and reporting flows.
